tasks.task: Farmer discusses linear irrigation systems with an agriculture expert.
subtasks: Farmer greets the agriculture expert and introduces themselves.
Farmer and expert explain the concept of linear irrigation.
Expert describes the advantages of linear irrigation for rectangular fields.
Farmer mentions the water efficiency of linear systems compared to center pivots.
Expert explains the limitations of linear systems, such as labor requirements and hose maintenance.
Farmer and expert discuss the longevity of hoses in linear irrigation systems.

tasks.task: Farmer demonstrates how to operate a linear irrigation system.
subtasks: Farmer explains the process of setting up the irrigation system.
Farmer describes the need to swap hoses at regular intervals.
Farmer explains how to connect hoses to hydrants and run the system.
Expert discusses the importance of maintaining a proper furrow for the system.
Farmer demonstrates using GPS technology to guide the irrigation machine.

tasks.task: Farmer explains the future aspects of linear irrigation systems.
subtasks: Farmer reflects on the ongoing maintenance of linear irrigation systems.
Farmer considers potential improvements in linear irrigation technology, such as GPS guidance.
Farmer thanks the expert for the discussion.
Farmer encourages viewers to check out other agricultural videos.
